* Mineralogy
* Stratigraphy

* Landslides, Structural Geology
* Analysis Methods
* Field Methods

### University of Colorado, Colorado Springs
* Introduction to GIS
* Biogeography
* Physical Geography
* Seminar I - Paradigm Shifts in Geography
